Save up to $5 per ticket by using Ticket Central's movie passes     Discount movie passes allow you to see virtually any movie playing around the country at up to a $5 discount per ticket!     A discount movie pass is a voucher that is purchased at a discounted price and then exchanged at a participating movie theater for movie tickets. Discount movie passes are available for purchase in person at NYU Box Office (with valid NYU ID) with cash, credit card or campus cash.     Paying by NYU Departmental Transfer or Check?   Submit our department request form .                 Ticket Central Movie Pass Menu   AMC/Loews Theatres                                                    AMC/Loews Theatre Locations                                 Village 7 66 3rd Ave (at 11th St.), 212-505-6397   19th Street East 890 Broadway, 212-260-8000   34th St. Theatre 312 West 34th St., 212-244-8686   Kips Bay 570 2nd Ave, 212-447-9425   Empire 25 234 West 42nd St., 212-398-3939   Orpheum 1538 3rd Ave (at 86th St.), 212-505-6397   72nd St. East 1230 3rd Ave., 212-879-1313   Lincoln Square 1998 Broadway, 212-336-5000   84th St. Theatre 2310 Broadway, (212) 877-3600   Harlem 2309 Frederick Douglass Blvd., 212-665-8742                       Type   Price   Restrictions     Gold   $8.50   None. Can be used anytime for any movie.  No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.amcentertainment.com .          United Artists, Edwards, and Regal Cinemas                                                    United Artists/Edwards/Regal Cinemas Locations                                 Regal Battery Park Stadium 16 102 North End Avenue, (212) 945-4370   Regal Union Square 850 Broadway (at 14th), (212) 253-6266   E-Walk 42nd St. and 8th Ave, 212-505-6397   United Artists 64th and 2nd 1210 Second Ave, (212) 832-1671   UA East 85th Street 1629 1st Ave (Between 84th and 85th), (212) 249-5100   UA Court Street Stadium 12 108 Court Street, Brooklyn, (718) 246-8170                       Type Price Restrictions   Premiere Supersaver $8.50 None. Can be used anytime for any movie. $1.50 surcharge in Manhattan theatres.  No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.regmovies.com .          City Cinemas (including Angelika Film Center)                                                    City Cinemas Locations                                 Angelika Film Center, 18 W. Houston St. (at Mercer St.), (212) 995-2000   Beekman Theare, 254 2nd Ave, (212) 585-4141   City Cinemas Village East, 181-189 2nd Ave (2nd Ave at 12th St.), (212) 529-6998   City Cinemas Cinema I, II, Third Ave, 1001 3rd Ave. (at 60th St.), (212) 753-6022   City Cinemas 86th St. East, 210 E. 86th St. (Bet. 2nd and 3rd Aves), (212) 249-1144                       Type  Price  Restrictions    Golden  $8.00  Cannot be used within the first 2 weeks of a movie's release. No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.citycinemas.com .          Bow-Tie Cinemas (Formerly Clearview Cinemas)                                                    Bow-Tie Cinemas Locations                                 Chelsea Cinemas 260 West 23rd Street (at 8th Ave), (212) 777-FILM (3456)     Ziegfeld 141 West 54th Street, (212) 765-7600     Hoboken Cinemas 409-415 14th Street,     Hoboken, (201) 710-5581                       Type Price Restrictions   Bonus Ticket $7.50 None. $1 surcharge at Manhattan theatres.  No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.bowtiecinemas.com.          *Prices of movie passes sold at Ticket Central include a 6% - 9% surcharge which reflects the shipping and handling costs of obtaining these tickets from theatre vendors.          Discount movie passes are always on sale at Ticket Central! There is no limit on the amount of passes you may purchase, but the box office cannot guarantee immediate fullfillment of large orders (50+ passes). Each week, Ticket Central offers discounted tickets to Broadway and Off-Broadway shows, sports games, and other NYC events. View the full list            ...and much more!                  Never pay full price for a movie again! Save up to $5 per ticket by using Ticket Central's movie passes. Read More                    Ticket Central can help you purchase group tickets to virtually any event in the NYC area! Read More                    Check out our Discount Finder for insider deals, discounts and tips for scoring tickets on the cheap for events in the NYC area Read More                    Reach over 32,000 NYU students, staff, faculty and alumni via email and social media Read More                                           For the most up-to-date deals, discounts and freebies, follow us on Facebook and Twitter !             NYU Card Information   Your valid NYUCard or Alumni ID is required for all transactions and services at NYU Ticket Central.   Only NYUCard holders with full university privileges (dark purple ID color) and Alumni with valid Alumni ID may purchase tickets to theatre, performing arts, sports and other special events, or claim free tickets to shows or movies on the first day of sale or distribution.   Please note that certain offers and deals are only available with an active NYU Home account.   Learn more about NYUCard »                           Mailing List   With so much going on at NYU Ticket Central, the best way to keep informed of our specials, discounts, bargains and give-aways is to join our email listserv!     How to join:   You can enter your email address here and you will be added to the listserv automatically.                                                Email:           Please check your spelling and hit submit only once!                          Submit                          Contact Us   Box Office Location:  566 LaGuardia Place  (Side entrance of the Kimmel Center)   Phone: 212.998.4941  Fax: 212.995.4961  Email: boxoffice@nyu.edu   Fall/Spring Hours:   Tuesday – Saturday,  noon–6:00pm   Closed on University holidays and breaks                                            NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University.
